context_for_next_testing_agent: Mission v9.1.5 completed successfully. All 3 objectives verified: 1) handleGoogleLogin redirects to #coach-dashboard (App.js:3176), 2) ChatWidget button is dynamic - shows 'Devenir Coach Partenaire' for visitors, 'Mon Espace Coach' for coaches (ChatWidget.js:3806-3834), 3) Vitrine page /coach/bassi works with elegant design showing offers and courses.
